docblock.description: A representation of a forum Board. Uses closure tables to maintain depth and proper ordering while getting O(1) query performance.

tag.name: property
tag.description: int category The ID of the Category this board is in

tag.name: property
tag.description: int parent The ID of the parent Board. If none, will be 0.

tag.name: property
tag.description: string name The name of the board.

tag.name: property
tag.description: int last_post The ID of the most recent Post on this Board.

tag.name: property
tag.description: int num_topics The number of Threads on this Board.

tag.name: property
tag.description: int num_replies The number of replies to Threads on this Board.

tag.name: property
tag.description: int total_posts The total number of Posts (in all threads) on this Board.

tag.name: property
tag.description: boolean ignoreable Whether or not this Board can be ignored.

tag.name: property
tag.description: int rank The rank, or order, of this board in its category.

tag.name: property
tag.description: string map An internally-used map that stores the order of the board in the board tree.

tag.name: property
tag.description: int minimum_post_level The minimum post authority of the user that is required to post on this board (either Admin = 0,Moderator = 1,anything else = 9998)

tag.name: property
tag.description: int status The status of this board. See the STATUS_* constants.

tag.name: property
tag.description: boolean locked Whether or not this board is locked from more posts.

tag.name: property
tag.description: int integrated_id If this board was imported, the PK of the old system's board.

docblock.description: The status constant for inactive Boards.
The status constant for active Boards.
The status constant for archived Boards.

tag.name: var
tag.description: Monitors whether parent has been changed.

docblock.description: Overrides xPDOObject::set to provide custom functionality and automation for the closure tables that persist the board map.
Override xPDOObject::remove to clear cache on remove
Overrides the xPDOObject::save method to provide custom functionality and automation for the closure tables that persist the board map.
Get all the IDs of the parents of this board up the tree
Fetch a board by ID
Grab the viewing text for the board.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The text returned for the viewing users.

docblock.description: Determine if a user is a moderator of this board
Grab the moderators text for the board.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The text returned for the viewing users.

docblock.description: Get an array of disUser objects who are Moderators of this board
Grabs a comma-separated list of direct subboards for this board.
Build the breadcrumb navigation for this board
Mark all threads in this board as read for a user.
Clear the cache for this board
See if the active user can post on this board
Get a full list of all boards on the forum, for any user
Fetch a full list of boards for the forum with restrictions based on current user
Get the 2nd to last Post
Calc the page of the last post on this board (requires prior data filled)
Can active user post a sticky thread on this board
Can active user post a locked thread on this board
Can active user post attachments on this board
Get the title of the last post on this board (requires prior data filled)
Get the URL of the last post on this board (requires prior data filled)
Override toArray to provide more values
Get the friendly URL for this board
Get the URL-friendly name of this board
